title: This is the state of the OCE boards right now
body:
https://imgur.com/GVIvXJg
https://imgur.com/Dv4ripG

Getting the hint yet Riot?

replies.body:
Good, it shown that these toxic players are getting punished. 

It funny you know; This is what people named "bronze syndrome". They themself are bad, but they blame every 1 else = These banned players are toxic, but they never take note of it, untill they got banned. Even then it is still the system is bad.

Oh and it just so happens that right now there is an increasing number of toxic players that so happen to be playing League right now? Nothing has changed on Riot's side of things? I highly doubt that.
Yea, and in the past people posting threads why dont toxic players get banned? Now the banned players post, why did i got banned.

people did get banned over time. there was a punishment tier system. you know, for **consistent** toxicity in relation to chat, rather than "say a certain word and get instantly suspended regardless if it was toxic in manner or not". maybe people "didnt get banned" because most people stopped being as toxic once their accounts had gone through tiers of chat restrictions and suspension, like riot used to say in their tips or whatever? "0.006% of players are negative enough to get permanently banned" these are riot's own words.

the issue has always been that trolls don't get banned. the actual toxic people that intentionally ruin games and act innocent in chat. this has been exasperated now that a bot has taken over.

Because when trolls get banned. The trolls know why they got banned and most dont come here to lodge a complain. Stop assuming they dont get banned, how would you know that? did you stalk them for over a month to make sure riot system is bad?

wait so you somehow know they get banned? who is the one actually assuming? 

do you actually read the boards? it's generally what most people say. you were referring to what people were posting on boards about people not getting banned. it is the way it is perceived.

it's pretty obvious it takes a lot more for a troll to get punished than someone who has toxic chat. you will not get instantly suspended because you fuck around in a match and waste people's time.

Trust me when I say, do not even bother replying to that guy.

On the actual topic, there is a LOT more flawed components with riot's system than just the banning system in place.

Riot either doesn't use logic in the process of what would be best for the game, or they use logic for their own gain, while diminishing the health of their own game which in the long run ends up not being for their own gain.

> [{quoted}](name=Transcender,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=U6yE2lNl,comment-id=0000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2018-01-02T22:16:57.964+0000)
>
> Trust me when I say, do not even bother replying to that guy.
> 
> On the actual topic, there is a LOT more flawed components with riot's system than just the banning system in place.
> 
> Riot either doesn't use logic in the process of what would be best for the game, or they use logic for their own gain, while diminishing the health of their own game which in the long run ends up not being for their own gain.

yeah he's a bit of a pain in the arse to be honest.
Any 1 who is against your "riot" banning system is flaw is a pain for you to deal with. You got banned!

> [{quoted}](name=TheDemonEmperor,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=U6yE2lNl,comment-id=000000000000000000000000000000010000,timestamp=2018-01-03T11:50:25.865+0000)
>
> Any 1 who is against your "riot" banning system is flaw is a pain for you to deal with. You got banned!

I'm not sure what you are trying to say here.

Yea, they should hire you; a professional about the matter, to fix their system. 

I know who you are, that scrub whitepumah that think he could goes pros and blame his team is shit. 6years on going perhave you should wake up, same with your input.
You're not exactly the best either mate, I still haven't forgotten the shit you said about my video when I posted it here on the boards.
Yea? why dont you post it again to remind me what it is.

https://imgur.com/130xguh

Let me remind you the stuff between me and Talon12 was simply banter and you took it the wrong way and got up at me for it.

> [{quoted}](name=Transcender,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=U6yE2lNl,comment-id=0000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2018-01-02T22:16:57.964+0000)
>
> Trust me when I say, do not even bother replying to that guy.
> 
> On the actual topic, there is a LOT more flawed components with riot's system than just the banning system in place.
> 
> Riot either doesn't use logic in the process of what would be best for the game, or they use logic for their own gain, while diminishing the health of their own game which in the long run ends up not being for their own gain.

He's worse than the instant feed back bot. Instead of just taking things out of context he replies.

more ignoring of the facts and false equivalencies from you. the issue is that there is a bot that indiscriminately is picking up words and throwing out bans to people that haven't actually been toxic, or not toxic enough, to warrant said bans, because it completely ignores context. to make it worse people then have to jump through hoops because the player support system is laughably pathetic. yet you're somehow making it equivalent to "bronze syndrome" and "bad people calling others bad" which has nothing to do with the actual issue being brought up, especially considering there has been even challenger players making these threads.

root of the problem is tencent being cheap skates and lowering the quality of their services to save a few bucks.

https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/

Yea? wanna make an impact? post there; It easier to talk shit about the banning system with the banned people. 

Why dont you take it to reddit and lodge a complain and see how many share your oppion?. Who know, you might even make it big enough for riot to take note. Which i highly doubt.

again, an empty response totally irrelevant to what has been said. 

instead of saying "go post on reddit to see how many people agree with you" (which is your go-to response in every thread) try actually responding to the content, points made and facts presented.

maybe you need to be less obsessed with downvoting people you don't agree with and having x amount of people agreeing with your opinion. i'm presenting facts about how things currently are working. it is not "shit talking" and having people "agree" with it is not a thing, because you know it is a fact, not an opinion. this is not being discussed just with "banned people" here. again another fact you conveniently ignore.

if you want to just keep ignoring the reality about how the bot is currently operating and it's flaws including riot's own words on the matter and all the discussions that are taking place both here and on NA boards, because it makes you feel better about yourself and your unrelated views of 'yes ban bronzies that are bad and call others bad!!!", be my guest. it's obvious it's because you are gold 5 and have a superiority complex. you always post something about "bronzies" and glad that "bad and toxic bronzies are getting banned" even though it has nothing to do with ranks (people of all ranks get banned). when you talk to someone that happens to be bronze, you jump at the opportunity to point it out. there has been plenty of people on the boards like you.

Stop using fact as a crutch to lean on. The people that got banned did toxic acts; Whether or not they are using key offensive words to trigger the bot or personal insult outside of the game. Your so call fact is that you believing they are as innocent as they claim; You have no fact, you just put your faith on the fews that come here to whine why they got banned. 

There are cases where the ban was unfair, dont get me wrong; But those are far fewer than compare to the bunch that say they got banned because the other guys made them. 

The reason i tell you to go to reddit is so your complains can be hear if many are behind your cause. KK? Your won't, because you know the majority dont care for why the banned players whine that they got banned.

i don't believe anyone has had an issue with people that are consistently toxic getting banned? perhaps some have an issue with the skipping of tiers for first time offenses and others have pointed out other types of punishments such as muting.  the issue is that the bot doesn't take context into account. 

ok so you now agree that there are people getting unfairly banned. so what exactly have you been arguing about? that has been the entire point. it will only get worse over time. flawed system is flawed and needs to be fixed.

> [{quoted}](name=TheDemonEmperor,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=U6yE2lNl,comment-id=00000001000000000000,timestamp=2017-12-31T06:27:20.912+0000)
>
> Stop using fact as a crutch to lean on. The people that got banned did toxic acts; Whether or not they are using key offensive words to trigger the bot or personal insult outside of the game. Your so call fact is that you believing they are as innocent as they claim; You have no fact, you just put your faith on the fews that come here to whine why they got banned. 
> 
> There are cases where the ban was unfair, dont get me wrong; But those are far fewer than compare to the bunch that say they got banned because the other guys made them. 
> 
> The reason i tell you to go to reddit is so your complains can be hear if many are behind your cause. KK? Your won't, because you know the majority dont care for why the banned players whine that they got banned.

I've been playing for years. The automation of player behaviour functions have been a complete joke. How about looking at the issue and making a sensible comment instead of blowing off and down voting people with legitimate concerns about the state of the game.

I sincerely hope you can experience first hand what people are talking about here.

yea, stop assuming this and that? down vote? i dont even touch that button. Any riot employee would vouch for me because on the system it will shown that. What issue? the people that voted on your banned have no issue with it. Remember some 1 has to report you for the system to pick up on it.

The boards are more strict than in-game moderation.

I've had a few bans on the boards (it happens when I drink), but I haven't had in-game penalties as long as OCE has existed...

Anyone find that amusing? (when all these posts img linked in OP are about game bans, not forums)

> [{quoted}](name=QAPLA,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=U6yE2lNl,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2018-01-04T04:02:51.441+0000)
>
> The boards are more strict than in-game moderation.
> 
> I've had a few bans on the boards (it happens when I drink), but I haven't had in-game penalties as long as OCE has existed...
> 
> Anyone find that amusing? (when all these posts img linked in OP are about game bans, not forums)

I haven't had a ban on boards but I have had one or two posts deleted. I couldn't really argue with their deletion tbh - I sometimes have spicy vernacular that many dont appreciate.
i feel like the word %%%% should be removed because the word is too universal, but the rest can stay oce could stand to learn some manners and be less of a %%%% in general
So how are all these people who are complaining about the banning system getting upvotes but when I show it to everyone I get downvotes? Hello?? I'm agreeing with you all here?
Because the person with oddly high upvotes in this scenario isn't getting real upvotes ;)

Need new board - "Why'd i get banned posts"

I get the system is fucked, i also understand toxic players are deserved of this (most of the time), but come on, i come to boards to read shitposting and random arguments, not read about why people got banned XD.

#bringbackshitposting2k18
I hope they get the hint tbh.
They should just do all the main sections by language then have a looking for players section for each region.
